items.title: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt for Service Industry Professionals

visible_instructors.name: Koundinya
visible_instructors.title: Koundinya Nemana (Edushore)
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert trainer for Lean | Lean Six Sigma | Creative Thinking

items.headline: Black Belt course exclusively designed for professionals who work in service industries (any non-manufacturing industry)
objectives_summary: Simplified explanations of all the concepts of Lean Six Sigma Black Belt with practical examples and exercises designed exclusively for service industry scenarios.
Multiple exercises (with key) for each module with detailed (step by step) instructions. All you need is MS Excel for these exercises and you can download these exercise files.
A real case study of how a Lean Six Sigma Black Belt project is driven to improve a service industry process.

items.title: Medical Devices Quality Management System - ISO 13485:2016
items.headline: Awareness and Application for the requirements of ISO 13485:2016 for Medical Device Development and QMS.
objectives_summary: How ISO 13485 requirements apply to medical device companies
Requirements of the ISO 13485:2016 standard
The importance of implementing a Quality Management System per ISO 13485:2016

Implement the proven quality management and quality improvement principles in your work areas.
